details.arabic_diacless: سجد وجهي للذي خلقه، وشق سمعه وبصره بحوله وقوته، فتبارك اللٰه أحسن الخالقين
details.arabic: سَجَدَ وَجْهِيَ لِلَّذِيْ خَلَقَهُ، وَشَقَّ سَمْعَهُ وَبَصَرَهُ بِحَوْلِهِ وَقُوَّتِهِ، فَتَبَارَكَ اللّٰهُ أَحْسَنُ الْخَالِقِيْنَ
details.transliteration: Sajada wajhiya lilla<u>th</u>ee khalaqahu, wa shaqqa sam'ahu wa basarahu bihawlihi wa quwwatihi. Fatabaarakallaahu 'ahsanul-khaaliqeen.
details.translations: I have prostrated my face to the One Who created it, and gave it hearing and sight by His might and His power. So blessed is Allah, the best of creators
